import React from 'react' import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' import List from './List' import {default as api} from '../store/apiSlice' const From = () => { const [addTransaction] = api.useAddTransactionMutation() const {register, handleSubmit, resetField} = useForm() const onSubmit = async (data) => { if(!data) return {} await addTransaction(data).unwrap() resetField("name") resetField("amount") } return (

Transaction

) } export default From
